text: Answer: 10000000 Solution: Given that 2 bytes of data is transfer in every 0.02 milliseconds, therefore total 2000 bytes data transfer by device in total 2000 x 0.02 = 20 milliseconds. So in 20 milliseconds processor execute total 40000000 cycles. And the number of times polling operation is perform in this 40000000 cycles is 40000000/500 = 80000 times and each time processor spend 100 cycles to perform polling. Therefore, number of cycle total spend on polling operation = 80000 x 100 = 8000000 cycles. Also given that the code to process 2 bytes of data and store it in a memory takes 2000 cycles, therefore total number cycle to process 2000 bytes of data = 1000 x 2000 = 2000000 cycles. Therefore, total cycles does the entire operation take is 8000000 + 2000000 = 10000000 cycles
